# Course syllabus

Part I --- Foundations of psycholinguistics

- Session 1: What is psycholinguistics? What do psycholinguists investigate?

- Session 2: Why, and how to, investigate linguistic meaning using psycholinguistic tools?

- Session 3: Processes and models of language production

- Session 4: Methods in language production research

- Session 5: Processes and models of language comprehension

- Session 6: Methods in language comprehension research pt. 1

- Session 7: Methods in language comprehension research pt. 2

- Session 8: Modeling psycholinguistic data

Part II --- Selected readings

- Session 9: Production studies ([Clarke, Elsner & Rohde, 2013](https://github.com/vini-macuch-silva/intro-to-psycholinguistics/tree/master/materials/S09-Clarke,Elsner&Rohde(2013).pdf); [Domaneschi, Romero & Braun, 2017](https://github.com/vini-macuch-silva/intro-to-psycholinguistics/tree/master/materials/S09-Domaneschi,Romero&Braun(2017).pdf))

- Session 10: Self-paced reading studies ([Bergen & Grodner, 2012](https://github.com/vini-macuch-silva/intro-to-psycholinguistics/tree/master/materials/S10-Bergen&Grodner(2012).pdf); [Rubio-Fernandez, 2013](https://github.com/vini-macuch-silva/intro-to-psycholinguistics/tree/master/materials/S10-Rubio-Fernandez(2013).pdf))

- Session 11: Visual world eye-tracking studies ([Kurumada, Brown, Bibyk, Pontillo & Tanenhaus, 2014](https://github.com/vini-macuch-silva/intro-to-psycholinguistics/tree/master/materials/S11-S11-Kurumada,Brown,Bibyk,Pontillo&Tanenhaus(2014).pdf); [van Bergen & Bosker, 2018](https://github.com/vini-macuch-silva/intro-to-psycholinguistics/tree/master/materials/S11-vanBergen&Bosker(2018).pdf))

- Session 12: Mouse-tracking studies ([Dale & Duran, 2011](https://github.com/vini-macuch-silva/intro-to-psycholinguistics/tree/master/materials/S12-Dale&Duran(2011).pdf); [Tomlinson, Bailey & Bott, 2013](https://github.com/vini-macuch-silva/intro-to-psycholinguistics/tree/master/materials/S12-Tomlinson,Bailey&Bott(2013).pdf))

- Session 13: Modeling production data ([Herbstritt & Franke, 2019](https://github.com/vini-macuch-silva/intro-to-psycholinguistics/tree/master/materials/S13-Herbstritt&Franke(2019).pdf))

- Session 14: Discourse, cognition and human interaction ([Levinson, 2006](https://github.com/vini-macuch-silva/intro-to-psycholinguistics/tree/master/materials/S14-Levinson(2006).pdf))
